From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"Power proves who leads. I have the power to fullfill my future, my
destiny, my dream, my GLORY." He yelled out. "It is our right as
Transformers to rule this universe, because we are superior, just like
it is my right to rule the Decepticons with my power."
